Sections.Name: AvoidRandomEncounters
Sections.Description: Enable ability to avoid a random encounter based on the higher of the Running or Stealth skill.

Keys.Name: MaxChanceToAvoidEncounter
Keys.Description: Maximum percent chance to avoid an encounter with 100 stealth or running. Scales.

Sections.Name: ShipTravelOptions
Sections.Description: Native Daggerfall time calculation for ship travel

Keys.Name: EnableDaggerfallNativeShipTravel
Keys.Description: Select whether to use the native Daggerfall time and cost calculation when traveling by ship. Only affects ship travel

Keys.Name: UseInnsWhenTravelingByShip
Keys.Description: Select whether or not to use inns or to camp out when traveling by Ship. Using inns will cost 5 GP per night on shore but can reduce the total travel time.
